post.description:
Invite a user to join the system.

It will create a user and temporary password, and send it to the user email.
On first login, the user needs to change the password using the /users/change_password endpoint

get.description: Get a specific user by id.

post.summary: Attach the user to a role
post.description: Attach the user to a role
Detach the user from a role
OAuth2 compatible token login, get an access token for future requests
Logout the user, invalidating the access token globally
